entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7 except plus 3 along the Bay of Chaleur coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 7 except plus 3 along the Bay of Chaleur coast. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
